A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: SUCKED.  Pretty sure Rian Johnson has never seen Star Wars before.\nSPOILER ALERT:!\nHe changed all the rules that have been in place for 7 movies:  Now Leia can fly; now Luke can make himself appear via hologram.  He totally changed the story about Kylo Ren and Nights of Ren -- and Leia's reaction makes no sense.  A major let down.  Worse than Jar Jar.
